author: donaldp
msg: Use ROLE constants rather than strings.

author: darrell
msg: - JDBCMailRepository and JDBCSpoolRepository now use Avalon and Cornerstone
- Got rid of separate dot.properties files for each JDBCMailRepository - configuration
is now primarily by a destinationURL, of the form "db://<datasource>/<table>/<repositoryKey>"
- Tables are now automatically created for Mail repositories where required
(only for MySQL and M$SQL so far).
- Added "config" section to repository config in MailStore - used to establish default
config for all MailRepositories of a particular class.
- JdbcUsersRepository (s) now take a "destinationURL" style config parameter,

author: charlesb
msg: Removed references to LogKit which are not used anymore
